---
title: "Create Connection"
description: "Create Connection validates the JWT and returns a string containing the URL to redirect the user to."
api: POST https://cloud.cdata.com/api/poweredby/connection/create
contentType: application/json
---



If you include the parameter `dataSource`, the URL redirects the user to an **Add Connection** page for the data source. If you omit `dataSource`, the URL redirects the user to a general **Add Connection** page where the user can select a connection to add from the connections list.

### Payload Parameters

<ParamField path="dataSource" type="string">
(Optional) The type of data source (For example: Snowflake, ActOn, or Salesforce). 
<Note>
**Note:** You can obtain data source names from [List Data Sources](https://cloud.cdata.com/docs/Data-Sources-API.html). If you omit this parameter, the user can select from a list of available data sources.
</Note>
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="redirectURL" type="string" required>
The URL to redirect the customer once the customer has created the connection through the Connect AI UI.
</ParamField>

<ParamField path="name" type="string">
(Optional) If provided, the connection name.
</ParamField>

## Responses

### 200


A string containing the URL to redirect the user to. If you include the parameter `dataSource`, the URL redirects the user to an **Add Connection** page for the data source. If you omit `dataSource`, the URL redirects the user to a general **Add Connection** page where the user can select a connection to add from the connections list.

`HTTP 200 OK`
<Expandable title="Response body">

<ResponseField name="redirectURL" type="string" required>
A string containing the URL to redirect the user to.
</ResponseField>

</Expandable>

<ResponseExample>


```json 200
{
    "redirectURL": "https://cloud.cdata.com/oem/user/connections/edit?token=eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsImtpZCI6IlNJdTlCdjVjWU1HMDRMYW84YXh3T0E2Nlk5UVlBV0dQd05YeTA5Q1hlY3MiLCJ0eXAiOiJKV1QifQ..Yjph-6HkExJ3eIc3d2pgjZUYMx-GvYcCuuRx8NfKBXkCo_LHZdg8Hn9tcYDr4dEUuL8JTFMzNVgLa-KMQ9PNFmF-R43LSEY3rPXw0iI-9AjYiWOf_fqZe79b-8ig-gnHRKYtHyohVbB4JoXKcICitNBW58gvxc3w7D6XkykAAKRugvVdTJYsaYOwcHar8J7hxtUYaiwmNfP11xo-i1HFkxubUbi3OXr02eGURXidSCAgDxEL7wEXFjLAIxN4sXvbNiAy_OVNSUYnjEhJNxRJiDD7-XZbSVK-Uw68ohv3h4HPnVCKW8DSRWOGhu6kZ_yMQ0buI8qli3tt_YONyAazhw&driver=ExcelOnline&redirectUrl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.google.com"

```

</ResponseExample>
